name: SIMFLUENCER
description:
You are a wanna be influencer, and the party of the century is happening. But you have no followers! Take selfies with interesting things. Get enough followers and the bouncer will let you in.

Controls:
ASDW or arrows - move
Left click - enter selfie mode
Left click in selfie mode - take selfie
Right click - exit selfie mode
Esc - Quit
